hero.headline: Give Rescue Dogs a Future, One Week at a Time
hero.subheadline: Support rescue dogs in China through cloud adoption. Make a real impact with weekly donations, weekly updates, and direct communication with shelters.

problem.title: The Challenge
problem.subtitle: Rescue shelters face critical barriers that prevent dogs from finding homes
problem.card1Desc: Rescue shelters in China face chronic funding shortages, making it difficult to care for all dogs in need.
problem.card2Desc: Traditional adoption requires long-term commitment many can't make, leaving countless dogs without support.
problem.card3Desc: People abroad want to help but lack direct connection to make a meaningful impact.

solution.title: Our Solution: Cloud Adoption
solution.subtitle: A Revolutionary Approach to Animal Welfare
solution.description: Cloud Rescue Foundation bridges the gap between compassionate people worldwide and rescue dogs in China. Through our cloud adoption model, you can sponsor a rescue dog remotely with weekly donations, receive weekly video updates, and chat directly with shelter managers‚Äîall while helping shelters grow sustainably.
solution.highlight: Every cloud adoption provides food, medical care, and shelter for rescue dogs while creating a transparent connection between adopters and shelters across borders.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Verify your phone number and browse verified shelters across China by province and city.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose a random dog ($9.99/week) or a specific dog ($59.99/5 weeks). Pricing varies by size: Small $9.99, Medium $15.99, Large $20.99 per week.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Receive mandatory weekly video updates and chat directly with shelter managers. Track your impact in real-time.

features.title: Why Choose Cloud Rescue
features.subtitle: Built with trust, transparency, and impact in mind
features.feature1Desc: Every shelter undergoes manual CSR verification before joining our platform.
features.feature2Desc: Weekly video updates required or dogs become ineligible. No updates, no adoptions.
features.feature3Desc: Chat directly with shelter managers. Share photos, videos, and messages across borders.
features.feature4Desc: US adopters pay via Stripe. Shelters receive funds through WeChat Pay or Alipay.
features.feature5Desc: View your complete adoption history, total donations, and days of care provided.
features.feature6Desc: Shelters unlock more dog slots at 90% adoption rate: 20 ‚Üí 50 ‚Üí 80 dogs.
features.feature7Desc: Primary dog videos are public. Additional detailed videos visible only to adopters.
features.feature8Desc: Works seamlessly across US-China internet restrictions. No VPN needed.

hero.title: About Cloud Rescue Foundation
hero.subtitle: Connecting hearts across borders, one rescue dog at a time

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To revolutionize animal welfare by creating a transparent, sustainable bridge between compassionate people worldwide and rescue dogs in China through innovative cloud adoption technology.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Cloud Rescue Foundation was born from a simple observation: countless people want to help rescue dogs but face barriers like distance, long-term commitment requirements, and lack of transparency. Meanwhile, rescue shelters in China struggle with chronic funding shortages and lack of international connections.
story.paragraph2: We recognized that technology could bridge these gaps. By creating a platform that enables "cloud adoption," we allow people worldwide to make meaningful weekly contributions to dogs they care about, while maintaining complete transparency through video updates and direct communication with shelter managers.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to connect thousands of adopters with verified shelters across China, providing sustainable support for dogs who need it most while empowering shelters to grow responsibly.

luna.title: Luna's Journey
luna.description: Luna was rescued from the streets of Beijing in critical condition. Through Cloud Rescue, she found 15 cloud adopters who supported her recovery. Today, Luna is healthy, happy, and has been traditionally adopted by a loving family in Shanghai.

max.title: Max's Second Chance
max.description: Max, a senior dog abandoned by his owners, found support through 8 dedicated cloud adopters. Their weekly contributions ensure Max receives the medical care and comfort he deserves in his golden years.
